verses.verse: Arise <S%H6965><s%>, shine <S%H215><s%>; for thy light <S%H216><s%> is come <S%H935><s%>, and the glory <S%H3519><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> is risen upon thee <S%H2224><s%>.

For <S%H2822><s%>, behold, darkness shall cover <S%H3680><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%>, and gross darkness <S%H6205><s%> the peoples <S%H3816><s%>; but Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> will arise <S%H2224><s%> upon thee <S%H3519><s%>, and his glory shall be seen upon thee <S%H7200><s%>.
And nations <S%H1471><s%> shall come <S%H1980><s%> to thy light <S%H216><s%>, and kings <S%H4428><s%> to the brightness <S%H5051><s%> of thy rising <S%H2225><s%>.

Lift up <S%H5375><s%> thine eyes <S%H5869><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%>, and see <S%H7200><s%>: they all gather themselves together <S%H6908><s%>, they come <S%H935><s%> to thee <S%H1121><s%>; thy sons shall come <S%H935><s%> from far <S%H7350><s%>, and thy daughters <S%H1323><s%> shall be carried <S%H539><s%> in the arms <S%H6654><s%>.

Then thou shalt see <S%H7200><s%> and be radiant <S%H5102><s%>, and thy heart <S%H3824><s%> shall thrill <S%H6342><s%> and be enlarged <S%H7337><s%>; because the abundance <S%H1995><s%> of the sea <S%H3220><s%> shall be turned <S%H2015><s%> unto thee <S%H2428><s%>, the wealth of the nations <S%H1471><s%> shall come unto thee <S%H935><s%>.

The multitude <S%H8229><s%> of camels <S%H1581><s%> shall cover <S%H3680><s%> thee <S%H1070><s%>, the dromedaries of Midian <S%H4080><s%> and Ephah <S%H5891><s%>; all they from Sheba <S%H7614><s%> shall come <S%H935><s%>; they shall bring <S%H5375><s%> gold <S%H2091><s%> and frankincense <S%H3828><s%>, and shall proclaim <S%H1319><s%> the praises <S%H8416><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>.

All the flocks <S%H6629><s%> of Kedar <S%H6938><s%> shall be gathered together <S%H6908><s%> unto thee <S%H352><s%>, the rams of Nebaioth <S%H5032><s%> shall minister <S%H8334><s%> unto thee <S%H5927><s%>; they shall come up with acceptance <S%H7522><s%> on mine altar <S%H4196><s%>; and I will glorify <S%H6286><s%> the house <S%H1004><s%> of my glory <S%H8597><s%>.
Who are these that fly <S%H5774><s%> as a cloud <S%H5645><s%>, and as the doves <S%H3123><s%> to their windows <S%H699><s%>?

Surely the isles <S%H339><s%> shall wait <S%H6960><s%> for me <S%H591><s%>, and the ships of Tarshish <S%H8659><s%> first <S%H7223><s%>, to bring <S%H935><s%> thy sons <S%H1121><s%> from far <S%H7350><s%>, their silver <S%H3701><s%> and their gold <S%H2091><s%> with them <S%H8034><s%>, for the name of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%> thy God <S%H430><s%>, and for the Holy One <S%H6918><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, because he hath glorified thee <S%H6286><s%>.

And foreigners <S%H5236><s%> shall build up <S%H1129><s%> thy walls <S%H2346><s%>, and their kings <S%H4428><s%> shall minister <S%H8334><s%> unto thee <S%H7110><s%>: for in my wrath I smote <S%H5221><s%> thee <S%H7522><s%>, but in my favor have I had mercy on thee <S%H7355><s%>.

Thy gates <S%H8179><s%> also shall be open <S%H6605><s%> continually <S%H8548><s%>; they shall not be shut <S%H5462><s%> day <S%H3119><s%> nor night <S%H3915><s%>; that men may bring <S%H935><s%> unto thee the wealth <S%H2428><s%> of the nations <S%H1471><s%>, and their kings <S%H4428><s%> led captive <S%H5090><s%>.

For that nation <S%H1471><s%> and kingdom <S%H4467><s%> that will not serve <S%H5647><s%> thee shall perish <S%H6><s%>; yea <S%H1471><s%>, those nations shall be utterly <S%H2717><s%> wasted <S%H2717><s%>.

The glory <S%H3519><s%> of Lebanon <S%H3844><s%> shall come <S%H935><s%> unto thee <S%H1265><s%>, the fir-tree, the pine <S%H8410><s%>, and the box-tree <S%H8410><s%> together <S%H3162><s%>, to beautify <S%H6286><s%> the place <S%H4725><s%> of my sanctuary <S%H4720><s%>; and I will make the place <S%H4725><s%> of my feet <S%H7272><s%> glorious <S%H3513><s%>.

And the sons <S%H1121><s%> of them that afflicted <S%H6031><s%> thee shall come <S%H1980><s%> bending <S%H7817><s%> unto thee <S%H5006><s%>; and all they that despised thee shall bow themselves down <S%H7812><s%> at the soles <S%H3709><s%> of thy feet <S%H7272><s%>; and they shall call <S%H7121><s%> thee The city <S%H5892><s%> of Jehovah <S%H3068><s%>, The Zion <S%H6726><s%> of the Holy One <S%H6918><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>.

Whereas <S%H8478><s%> thou hast been forsaken <S%H5800><s%> and hated <S%H8130><s%>, so that no man passed through <S%H5674><s%> thee <S%H7760><s%>, I will make thee an eternal <S%H5769><s%> excellency <S%H1347><s%>, a joy <S%H4885><s%> of many <S%H1755><s%> generations <S%H1755><s%>.

Thou shalt also suck <S%H3243><s%> the milk <S%H2461><s%> of the nations <S%H1471><s%>, and shalt suck <S%H3243><s%> the breast <S%H7699><s%> of kings <S%H4428><s%>; and thou shalt know <S%H3045><s%> that I <S%H3068><s%>, Jehovah, am thy Saviour <S%H3467><s%>, and thy Redeemer <S%H1350><s%>, the Mighty One <S%H46><s%> of Jacob <S%H3290><s%>.

For brass <S%H5178><s%> I will bring <S%H935><s%> gold <S%H2091><s%>, and for iron <S%H1270><s%> I will bring <S%H935><s%> silver <S%H3701><s%>, and for wood <S%H6086><s%> brass <S%H5178><s%>, and for stones <S%H68><s%> iron <S%H1270><s%>. I will also make <S%H7760><s%> thy officers <S%H6486><s%> peace <S%H7965><s%>, and thine exactors <S%H5065><s%> righteousness <S%H6666><s%>.

Violence <S%H2555><s%> shall no more be heard <S%H8085><s%> in thy land <S%H776><s%>, desolation <S%H7701><s%> nor destruction <S%H7667><s%> within thy borders <S%H1366><s%>; but thou shalt call <S%H7121><s%> thy walls <S%H2346><s%> Salvation <S%H3444><s%>, and thy gates <S%H8179><s%> Praise <S%H8416><s%>.

The sun <S%H8121><s%> shall be no more thy light <S%H216><s%> by day <S%H3119><s%>; neither for brightness <S%H5051><s%> shall the moon <S%H3394><s%> give light <S%H216><s%> unto thee <S%H3068><s%>: but Jehovah will be unto thee an everlasting <S%H5769><s%> light <S%H215><s%>, and thy God <S%H430><s%> thy glory <S%H8597><s%>.

Thy sun <S%H8121><s%> shall no more go down <S%H935><s%>, neither shall thy moon <S%H3391><s%> withdraw <S%H622><s%> itself <S%H3068><s%>; for Jehovah will be thine everlasting <S%H5769><s%> light <S%H216><s%>, and the days <S%H3117><s%> of thy mourning <S%H60><s%> shall be ended <S%H7999><s%>.

Thy people <S%H5971><s%> also shall be all righteous <S%H6662><s%>; they shall inherit <S%H3423><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%>, the branch <S%H5342><s%> of my planting <S%H4302><s%>, the work <S%H4639><s%> of my hands <S%H3027><s%>, that I may be glorified <S%H6286><s%>.

The little one <S%H6996><s%> shall become a thousand <S%H505><s%>, and the small one <S%H6810><s%> a strong <S%H6099><s%> nation <S%H1471><s%>; I <S%H3068><s%>, Jehovah, will hasten <S%H2363><s%> it in its time <S%H6256><s%>.
